definitions.definition: the foot of an animal that has claws or nails, such as a cat, dog, or bear:
examples: I found paw prints in the kitchen.
Take your filthy paws off my nice clean towel!

definitions.definition: to touch something with a paw:
examples: When their dog heard them it began pawing (at) the ground in excitement.

definitions.definition: to feel or touch someone roughly with the hands, especially in an unpleasant sexual way
